description:
Looks like the feature allowed-address-pairs is not complete. It addressed neutron side changes but ignored that are required in  nova compute.

It did not work with libvirtHybridOVSBridgeDriver. The packets are dropped by ebtables as no proper policies are defined to allow the IPs that are specified in allowed-address-pairs.

This feature worked with  libvirtGenericVIFDriver as expected.
title: port allowed_address_pair feature does not work with all libvirtVifDrivers
